top10_tweets_like: We cannot talk about art and #rstats and not mention the pipe. The pipe operator is in the magrittr package. Artist René Magritte depicts a smoking pipe in the Treachery of Images. The writing says that this is not a pipe. After all, it is not a pipe but only a depiction of it. https://t.co/DJH4QXvLkG
I’ve been coding in #rstats for three years, and I’ve never used a for loop. I don’t know if I should feel shame or pride. Either way, thank you, functional programming. https://t.co/iYxLQIB3hs

Christians and Muslims in the Kingdom of Yugoslavia in 1931

#religion #Diversity #culture #history #census #bigdata #dataviz #maps #rstats https://t.co/HSoMHJ2JN7

#rstats #rtip - If you're like me, you like to have the end of a script in the middle of the panel, enable "Allow scroll past end of document"

Global Options > Code > Display https://t.co/V4yZgV0oQw

{datapasta} is one of the great #rstats Konomicode packages. Along with {clipr} (which datapasta depends) 

Tooling like this make exploration, discovery, and prototyping so much faster. Friction reducers are under appreciated. https://t.co/ItkPTcNp4a

Daniel Trupp, an undergrad in my lab, has made an #rstats package for reading and validating LI-6800 raw files.

We are releasing the alpha version today. 

If you have #6800life files and use R, plz read blog and try it out! Comments, criticism welcome.

https://t.co/nyLvIpTbGj

My Shiny hot take is that modules are **not** an advanced topic. IMHO it’s so much easier and more natural for #rstats users to write small, modular functions that they can independently play with and test than huge monolithic apps (1/3)

When are the people of the suburbs of Townsville most irritated by canine noises? Winter, it appears. #TidyTuesday  #rstats, #r4ds.

I'm using a dyslexia-friendly font called OpenDyslexic - I find it much easier to read.
https://t.co/RBuWS6e5SL
 code: https://t.co/C7ZbxtioYD https://t.co/AJ9KU2yFka

Just in case, anybody needs to estimate interaction effects with {pglm}, I've just packaged a couple of functions that adapt @thosjleeper's excellent {margins} for pglm objects

https://t.co/94P5ENkxfT

#rstats #pglm #OneReasonLessToUseStata https://t.co/YojtA5o2y5

I will close of today's art show with some generative art by @djnavarro 

You can see more art work by her on her website: https://t.co/JShngAUkjM

Also, you can learn to make art in #rstats with her blog post:
https://t.co/9fq2p52LHo https://t.co/dDMmYeMZRu
